phrases: The shadow of evil is closing in
on the trendy members of the anime industry.
Anyone who tries to take advantage of youthful passion...
In the name of the moon, Sailor Moon will punish you!
I am sorry I am not straightforward, I can say it in my dreams
My thoughts are about to short circuit, I want to see you right now
Moonlight that makes me want to cry, midnight that keeps me from calling
Because I am so innocent, what should I do?
Guided by the light of the moon
We will meet again and again
I count the sparkle of constellations to foretell the future of my love
We were born in the same land, miracle romance
I believe in it, miracle romance
I do not look like a super heroine, but I am!
As you know, I transform myself by using a peculiar brooch
I am the sailor warrior of love and justice, Sailor Moon!
And my friends are the smart and sweet Ami Mizuno,
and a slightly quick-tempered psychic girl, Rei Hino.
Both of them are so dependable, I feel like I will fall behind.
But anyway, I just have to do my best!
Sailor V A great theatrical anime masterpiece!
She is getting turned into an anime.
I wish someone would make an anime about me.
If there is someone willing to make such a silly anime,
I would have to see it to believe it.
Did you understand what Director Asatou said?
Because he talks in such abstract terms!
It is a little different from what I had in my mind.
Well, I do not really know how to say it, but...
For example, this posture of Sailor V's...
I just do not feel the love.
And the line of this leg is lacking a certain passion.
Are you basically saying we should make her look more sexy?
I would never say such an indecent thing!
Maybe I should quit the anime industry.
I will not give up so easily!
That is the Hiromi I know!
All right, let us sprint to the studio!
Studio Dive 170 X-XO Asabu Juban, OX Ward, Tokyo
Studio Dive 170 X-XO Asabu Juban, OX Ward, Tokyo Studio Dive?
I have to go to cram school now.
I guess I will return this later.
Tying a dream together in light and shadow,
time is spun and remains in the eye.
The next provider of energy that the Twins,
the constellation of Gemini, points to is her.
It seems the time has come for me to use my strongest monsters.
I cannot depict Sailor V's love and passion at all!
I did not know Kazuko was this good!
and her love and passion are depicted perfectly!
I guess I will have to use this again.
Mommy, please buy this for me!
Thank you for coming to the XX Department Store.
We will also be pro animators starting this spring.
Would not it be nice to draw main characters with pencils like these?
That is why we will buy one together!
And like this, we will divide them into matching pencil boxes.
This way, we can both have half of them.
But these pencils are to commemorate us becoming pros this spring,
so we will only use them for special occasions.
Only when we draw the finest anime
that will never disappoint the dreams of children!
We have to get each other's permission to untie that ribbon!
I have already used quite a bit without telling Kazuko.
But I kind of get fired up when I use this.
Besides, I am going to get left behind by Kazuko at this rate.
You are Miss Hiromi Matsuno, correct?
I am a fan of yours.
And I really wanted to see where you worked.
Now, I just need to lure those sailor warriors here.
You are up to something again, are not you?!
Sailor Mercury is not going to let you have your way!
Well, you have saved me the trouble.
I have prepared my best monsters just for you guys.
Make sure to train yourself until the time comes to fight them!
This is very important to us.
Oh, Hiromi, you should thank her, too...
She has a lot of work piled up, so she seems a bit dazed.
Please come and see us again.
Please come and see us again.
Of course, I would love to!
What in the world did Nephrite do in here?
What in the world did Nephrite do in here?
I have to find out, no matter what!
That is not like you, Ami.
Trying to take on Nephrite by yourself!
I would have come right away, if you would just called me!
I never expected to hear that coming from you, Usagi.
Well, it is the place where they are producing the Sailor V anime, right?!
If I got lucky, I might have gotten a cel from them!
Then let us all go to Studio Dive after school.
After all, we have to find out why Nephrite was there.
We cannot just ignore it, since Nephrite showed up there!
Finished Hiromi, did you draw all those in just one night?
Hiromi, did you draw all those in just one night?
I will be using this room by myself today.
Kazuko will never be better than me again,
as long as I have this pencil.
I have no interest in going there.
What have you been doing all this time?!
Someone was kept behind to do some studying.
But earlier, you said you were not interested...
Well, we cannot just ignore it if Nephrite showed up there, right?!
What are you going to do with so many sheets of velum?
Oh, no, my friends asked me to get autographs...
You want to get those autographs for yourself, do not you?!
You want to get those autographs for yourself, do not you?!
Rei, we are going to be in the 9th grade next year.
Nothing, that is all I wanted to say.
Is she trying to pick a fight with me?
I wonder, is your plan going well this time?
I shall see how well you do.
I am sorry for really taking you up on your offer to visit.
I am sorry for really taking you up on your offer to visit.
I am sorry for really taking you up on your offer to visit.
Hey, do not you think Sailor V looks like me?
It is okay, please make yourself at home.
Hey, do not you think Sailor V looks like me?
It is okay, please make yourself at home.
Something must be wrong with your eyes!
There is something I would like to ask you.
Something must be wrong with your eyes!
There is something I would like to ask you.
Take a good look at these legs!
Go right ahead, ask me anything.
Take a good look at these legs!
Go right ahead, ask me anything.
Has anything unusual happened here recently?
Why do not you keep it down a little?!
Due to the noise, keep private conversations under 10 seconds.
Due to the noise, keep private conversations under 10 seconds.
You are so loud, I cannot stand it!
They are here because they like our work!
They just want autographs and cel art!
That is not what these girls have in mind!
Anyway, do not let outsiders in here!
Miss Hiromi, it is from the director.
I just saw your work over here.
Keep up the good work for the last scene, too!
Director, in the last scene, Sailor V will be killed!
That is the kind of thrilling story that children want these days.
Hiromi, are you serious about what you just said?
The director asked me to do the last scene.
You know everyone has to work together to create an anime!
That is what you always used to say!
But it is just an anime.
I feel the aura of a monster.
I feel the aura of a monster.
This is a waste of time!
you think I have no talent, do not you?
You are so uppity, just because you have a little more talent than me!
But, I will be better than you from now on!
As long as I have this pencil!
Those two monsters are like twins,
bound together by a strong friendship.
And that power is several levels greater than the sailor warriors!
They will meet their end today.
How dare you take advantage of anime, which nurtures children's dreams
and the passion of a young woman?!
The girls who like anime are mad!
In the name of the moon,
How come they are using the same techniques as us?
I will finish off you guys!
This is the end of our friendship!
We will show them what real teamwork is!

We are in a bad mood today

Kazuko, the truth is, those pencils...

Kazuko, the truth is, those pencils...
Kazuko, the truth is, those pencils...
Hiromi, there is something I have been hiding from you.
Hiromi, there is something I have been hiding from you.
If you make fun of girls
I am sorry for breaking our promise.
If you make fun of girls
I was frustrated because you always did such a great job, We will not forgive you
I was frustrated because you always did such a great job,
so I used these to motivate myself.
I felt like I would get left behind, if I did not do anything about it.
But that is how I felt!
I think in the end, it was not wrong of us to use these pencils.
Because everything we create should be anime
that does not disappoint the children's dreams!
Then let us make a promise!
Then let us make a promise!
If you make fun of girls
Let us continue to work hard, If you make fun of girls
so we never disappoint the children's dreams!
Looks like the finished Sailor V anime will be something to look forward to!
In my dream, you and I were together
When we were friends, it did not bother us
And we casually talked to each other
But there was a moment when I noticed only you
I want to become prettier right here and now
Something changes when you fall in love
I close my eyes and check to make sure
